array.name: quotes
array.item: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breath you will be successful
Either push your limits or die
Don\'t practice until you get it right, practice until you can\'t get it wrong
Throw me to the wolves I will return leading the pack
Do it yourself because no one else will
What would you do if you weren\'t afraid?
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit reason you keep giving yourself as to why you can\'t achieve it
People want to see you doing well but not better than them
People cry not because they are weak it\'s because they have been strong for very long
You do not know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have
The fool didn\'t know it was impossible so he did it
If you set your goals ridiculously high and it\'s failure, you will fail above everyone\'s success
Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work
You will always be measured by your ability to execute under pressure
â€œCourage doesn\'t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, I will try again tomorrow.
Be yourself, everyone else is already taken.
Find out what you truly love to do and then direct all of your energy towards doing it.
